Title: Active Directory Browser web part for SharePoint
Description:
Have you ever needed to know what the membership of a particular Active Directory group is before granting the whole group access to a SharePoint site or list? 

This SharePoint web part allows end users to view all of the Active Directory users in each AD group under a specified LDAP path. This is a read only view of the group members.
